data.title: Readings in Slavic Literature 4. Monk Chrabr on Slavic Writings. the Oldest Cyrillic Version of 1348 by Ilarion, Metropolitan (Dr. Ohienko). Editor: Good Soft cover (1964) 1st Edition.
data.meta_description: 1st Edition. - Soft cover - University of Manitoba Press., Winnipeg - 1964 - Condition: Good - First printing in stapled paper covers. Edited with notes and commentaries in Ukrainian. 28 pp. Illustrations, charts. Some moisture rippling to bottom of front cover and progressively lighter into text (no staining). Very Good. - Readings in Slavic Literature 4. Monk Chrabr on Slavic Writings. the Oldest Cyrillic Version of 1348
data.text:
Terms of Sale:

Any book may be returned for any reason. If not as described we will pay shipping

both ways. We accept Visa, Mastercard and Paypal. Thank you for your business.

Ken and Cathie Jackson

5864 Dalcastle Drive NW Calgary Alberta T3A 2B6 Canada

403-247-9717

kenjacksonbooks@gmail.com

Shipping Terms:

Orders usually ship within 4 business days. Shipping costs are based on books weighing 2.2 LB, or 1 KG. If your book order is heavy or oversized, we may contact you to let you know extra shipping is required.
